text: Great service from Foren! Appreciate his help in adjusting my guitar strings and patiently addressing my questions ‚Äî super helpful and friendly throughout. üëç
Kayden has great improvement in learning 1-1 piano class with Mr Koh at Cristofori in down town east.  Mr Koh is very patient with him.
Visited the outlet to purchase drumsticks, staff Nicholas is friendly and answered all my queries promptly and professionally

Just started a few weeks of violin lesson for my 4-year-old with Cristofori Downtown East. My son will definitely continue his music learning journey with this school.

The admin staff, especially Mr Edmund was very helpful. He went the extra miles to make sure my requirements were met. His replies were prompt and he was very good at giving suggestions to encourage me to eventually gave Cristofori a try. He wasn‚Äôt hard sell and impatient. He is friendly, efficient and undoubtedly one of the best music school admin staff I have ever met.

The violin teacher, Miss Vicky is very accommodating and patient. She is able to be friendly with my son and at the same time be firm with him. He has been following the lessons and often surprised me with how well he is comprehending her instructions. Miss Vicky is flexible with her approaches in teaching violin to toddlers and she is comfortable to allow me to sit in during the violin lesson.

All in all, i am having a very positive and pleasant experience with this music school.

A very good place to learn music. I like the ambience here as it gives me a warm and pleasant feeling. The staffs are helpful and cheerful. I believe the teachers should be just as good.  There is no other place i want to send my children to except downtown east.
